Key Match Events: Stephon Castle helped San Antonio to a 60-55 lead at halftime
San Antonio kept their visitors at bay with timely stops and crucial shotmaking
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Spurs are now 2-2 with their lottery pick in the starting lineup following their rout of the Sacramento Kings on Monday
Others: Stephon Castle started in the backcourt with Chris Paul
Castle was known for his elite defense
De'Aaron Fox finished the first half with nine points on 4-for-8 shooting
Castle went 3-for-5, including 1-for-2 from deep for seven first-quarter points
